data.title: Marcel van Eeden »Der heimliche Kaiser« • PiB (Photography in Berlin)
data.meta_description: Feb 18 — Apr 21, 2024 | Happy Thursday: Thu Mar 7, Apr 4, 1 – 9 pm | Führung (de): Sa, 9. Mar, 15h, Fr, 15. Mar, 16h, Sa, 16. Mar, 15h
data.text:
Saturday, Feb 17, 2024, 6 pm

Opening reception

Welcome:

Regine von Monkiewitsch, 1st Chairwoman, Museum für Photographie Braunschweig

Prof. Dr. Anja Hesse, City Councilor for Culture and Science, City of Braunschweig

Friedemann Schnur, Executive board, Die Braunschweigische Stiftung

Barbara Hofmann-Johnson, Director, Museum für Photographie Braunschweig

Dr. Bettina Ruhrberg, Director, Mönchehaus Museum Goslar

Introduction:

Dr. Reinhard Spieler, Director, Sprengel Museum Hannover

Sunday, Feb 18, 2024, 11:30 am

Opening reception at Mönchehaus Museum Goslar

Welcome:

Dr. Bettina Ruhrberg, Director, Mönchehaus Museum Goslar

Barbara Hofmann-Johnson, Director, Museum für Photographie Braunschweig

Urte Schwerdtner, Mayor, Goslar

Jens Müller, Regional director, Sparkasse Hildesheim Goslar Peine

Introduction: Dr. Reinhard Spieler, Director, Sprengel Museum Hannover

Saturday, Feb 24, 2024, 11 am

City tour (de) with local references to motifs from the exhibition „Marcel van Eeden. Der heimliche Kaiser“ with Elke Frobese, historian and certified city guide. Elke Frobese will guide you to the places that Marcel van Eeden photographed for the exhibition „Der heimliche Kaiser“ in Braunschweig. The motifs of the photographic works are the occasion for a special city tour, during which the history of the city and the context of the exhibition are conveyed. Cost: €10, registration: or phone (0531) 75000. Start: Museum für Photographie Braunschweig.

Thursday, Mar 7 , 1 – 8 pm

Happy Thursday in Braunschweig

Admission free and guided tour at 6 pm on the first Thursday of every month.

Saturday, Mar 9, 2024, 3 pm

Exhibition tour and come together in Goslar

or members of the Museum für Photographie Braunschweig e.V., application: or tel. (0531) 75000.

Friday, Mar 15, 2024, 4 pm

Exhibition tour for hearing impaired visitors in Braunschweig

Schwerhörigengruppe auris – Beratungsstelle für Hörgeschädigte.

Saturday, Mar 16, 3 pm

Exhibition tour and come together in Braunschweig

for members of the Mönchehaus Museum.

Mittwoch, 20. März & Dienstag, 26. März 2024, 10 Uhr

Easter vacation children‘s workshop in Goslar

“Old pictures. New stories” with Eden Neal Liedtke, info and application: www.moechnehaus.de

Wednesday, Mar 27 & Thursday, Mar 28, 2024, 10 – 2 pm

Easter vacation workshop for kids in Braunschweig

“Fotografie meets Comic” for kids & teens from 11-15 years, with Franziska Habelt and Maika Flügel, info and application: FiBS-Portal or

Thursday, Apr 4 , 1 – 8 pm

Happy Thursday in Braunschweig

Free admission, extended opening hours until 8 pm, and a guided tour at 6 pm on the first Thursday of each month.

Sunday, Apr 7, 2024, 11.30 am

Lecture in Goslar: “Das Geschichtsverständnis der Nationalsozialisten” With Dr. Peter Schlag, historican, info and application: www.moenchehaus.de

Saturday, Apr 20, 2024, 3 pm

Lecture in Braunschweig: “Rembrandt der Deutsche als Bildungsguru??”

With Prof. Dr. h.c. Gerd Biegel, TU Braunschweig, followed by a talk in the exhibition with Marcel van Eeden, admission: 10 €, reduced 8 €, application: or tel. (0531) 75000

Sunday, Apr 21, 2024, 11.30 am

Finissage in Goslar

Artist talk (de) with Marcel van Eeden at Mönchehaus Museum.

Mother’s Day: Sunday, 12.05.2024

11 am: Guided tour for families

11 am: Bicycle tour „In the footsteps of the photographer Käthe Buchler“ to picture

locations in Braunschweig and the surrounding area

Double guided tour for the Friends of the Herzog Anton Ulrich Museum: „Family portraits

from Baroque painting to contemporary photography“: Tuesday, 14.05.2024, 4.30 pm

with Dr. Sarah Babin, HAUM and Franziska Habelt, Museum für Photographie Braunschweig.

The tour starts at HAUM and ends at the Museum für Photographie Braunschweig.

Double guided tour for the members of the Museum für Photographie Braunschweig:

„Family portraits from Baroque painting to contemporary photography“:

Thursday, 16.05.2024, 4.30 pm

with Dr. Sarah Babin, HAUM and Franziska Habelt, Museum für Photographie Braunschweig.

The tour starts at HAUM and ends at the Museum für Photographie Braunschweig.

International Museum Day: „Enjoy museums with joy“: Sunday, 19.05.2024, 11 am – 6 pm

from 12 noon: Short guided tours every hour on the hour with the museum team

from 12 noon: Photo station (with Hugo Hilpmann)

3 pm: Guided tour for families

International Children’s Day: Saturday, 01.06.2024, from 11 am

11 am – 1 pm: Photo workshop for kids (with Josephine Schulz)

3 pm: Guided tour for families

HAPPY THURSDAY: Thursday, 06.06.2024, 1-8 pm

free admission and guided tour with the museum team at 6 pm

Lange Nacht der Museen: Saturday, 08.06.2024, 6 pm – midnight

Short guided tours every hour on the hour and jazz in the museum garden with the ensemble

Jazz Galore

Finissage: Sunday, 30.06.2024, 4 pm

with guided tour and participants of the exhibition
